  window.timeRemaining = function timeRemaining(epochTime){
  
    var diff = epochTime - ((new Date()).getTime() / 1000);
    var num_unit = (diff < 60 && [Math.max(diff, 0), 'seconds']) ||
      ((diff/=60) < 60 && [diff, 'minutes']) ||
      ((diff/=60) < 72 && [diff, 'hours']) ||
      [diff/=24, 'days'];
  
    // Round down
    num_unit[0] = Math.floor(num_unit[0]);
    // Singularize unit
    if (num_unit[0] == 1) { num_unit[1] = num_unit[1].replace(/s$/,""); }
  
    return num_unit;
  };
</script>

<div id="growl_section" class="center jGrowl"></div><div id="main_content">

<a rel="publisher" style="display:none" href="https://plus.google.com/118239121095465976293">Google+</a>
<div class="NS_site__projects_hero bg-green-dark loading relative border-bottom">
<div class="pager-dots pager absolute center full-width z_overlap_slider"></div>
<div class="slides full-height cycle-slideshow" data-cycle-fx="fade" data-cycle-log="false" data-cycle-next=".js-carousel-next" data-cycle-pager=".pager-dots" data-cycle-prev=".js-carousel-previous" data-cycle-slides="&gt; div" data-cycle-timeout="8000">
<div class="hero-slide hero-slide--reissue-of-the-1977-epa-graphic-standards-system js-cycle-slide white" data-theme="dark-theme" data-title="Featured Project: The EPA Graphics Standards&amp;nbsp;System" style="background-image: url(&#39;https://d3mlfyygrfdi2i.cloudfront.net/EPA-Hero-19-darker.jpg&#39;); background-position: center center;">
<div class="hero-slide__content hero-slide__content--">
<div class="hero-slide__interior hero-slide__interior--">
<h1 class="hero-slide__title">
The EPA Graphics Standards&nbsp;System
</h1>
<div class="hero-slide__subtitle">
Help reissue the Environmental Protection Agencys 1977 graphics manual, a testament to designs impact on government&nbsp;agencies.
</div>
<a class="btn btn--green btn--large " href="/projects/thestandardsmanual/reissue-of-the-1977-epa-graphic-standards-system?ref=hero">View project</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="js-cycle-slide hero-slide hero-slide--dark gradient-lavender-to-powder" data-theme="dark-theme" data-title="Impact: creators pursue bold ideas">
<div class="hero-slide__content">
<div class="h100p flex flex-column justify-center items-center">
<div class="col-center col-22-24 col-sm-20-24 col-md-16-24 col-lg-11-24">
<h1 class="type-60 type-66-sm type-100-md medium navy-900">
Creators <span class="relative"><span class="block absolute b1 h20p bg-tangerine-600_20 l0 w100p js-impact-headline-underline transition-200"></span><span class="relative">thrive</span></span> here.
</h1>
<div class="type-16 type-18-sm navy-600">
Kickstarter creators pursue bold ideas on their own terms  and make an impact on the world, too.
</div>
<a href="/impact?ref=hero"><div class="bttn bttn-shadow-dark bttn-medium tangerine-800 mt2 mt4-sm">
Read their stories
</div>
</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="hero-slide hero-slide--neolucida-xl js-cycle-slide white" data-theme="dark-theme" data-title="Featured Project: The NeoLucida XL" style="background-image: url(&#39;https://d3mlfyygrfdi2i.cloudfront.net/NeoLucidaXL.jpg&#39;); background-position: center center;">
<div class="hero-slide__content hero-slide__content--">
<div class="hero-slide__interior hero-slide__interior--">
<h1 class="hero-slide__title">
The NeoLucida XL
</h1>
<div class="hero-slide__subtitle">
This large-scale, modern take on the nineteenth-century camera lucida helps anyone learn to draw what&nbsp;they&nbsp;see.
</div>
<a class="btn btn--green btn--large " href="/projects/pgarcia/neolucida-xl?ref=hero">View project</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="js-cycle-slide hero-slide hero-slide--happening" data-theme="light-theme" data-title="Happening">
<div class="hero-slide__content">
<div class="hero-slide__interior">
<div class="container-flex px3 px7-sm">
<div class="col-center col-6">
<img alt="Happening" class="fit" src="https://static.kickstarter.com/assets/happening/light-happening-title-treatment-aeb5f14419345bf367adda7386be47375ce0fb48d81e97ba4e9bf12b36f38ff3.svg" />
<div class="happening-subtitle mb3 mb7-sm">
The latest in art, culture, and technology.
</div>
<a class="btn btn--green btn--large" href="/happening?ref=hero">Take a look!</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="js-cycle-slide hero-slide gradient-sand-to-sage clip" data-theme="light-theme" data-title="iOS launch 3.0">
<div class="absolute t0 l0 l-auto-md r0-md b0 w100p w50p-sm mt12 clip hide mr5 center inline-block-md">
<img src="https://d3mlfyygrfdi2i.cloudfront.net/d3fd/iOS_3.0_2.png" alt="Ios 3.0 2" />
</div>
<div class="absolute t0 b0 w50p-md w100p">
<div class="hero-slide__content text-center">
<div class="hero-slide__interior">
<h1 class="type-28 type-48-sm type-60-md medium teal-900 mt10-sm">
Bring new ideas to life, anywhere.
</h1>
<div class="w75p-sm m-auto text-center">
<p class="type-18 teal-900 mb2 mb6-sm hide block-md">
Explore creative projects and help bring bold new ideas into the world with the Kickstarter app.
</p>

</a>
</div>

<a class="bttn bttn-white bttn-medium" href="/download?d=true&amp;ref=hero">
Get the app
</a>
</div>
<div class="hide-md w80p mt5 mt10-sm center inline-block">
<img src="https://d3mlfyygrfdi2i.cloudfront.net/755d/iOS_3.0_1.png" alt="Ios 3.0 1" />
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="hero-slide hero-slide--light hero-slide--the-creative-independent" data-theme="dark-theme">
<div class="hero-slide__content">
<div class="hero-slide__interior">
<div class="container-flex px3">
<div class="col-center col-10 text-center">
<div class="hero-slide--the-creative-independent__subtitle">
Launched September 2016, The Creative Independent
is a resource of emotional and practical guidance for creative&nbsp;people.
</div>
<a target="_blank" class="btn btn--tci btn--large mb3 mb7-sm mt2 no-radius" href="https://thecreativeindependent.com">Visit thecreativeindependent.com
</a></div>
</div>

</div>

<div class="mobile-scroll-row-item col col-4">
<div class="js-score-tracking js-track-project-card project-card project-card-tall-big project-card-wrap ratio-16-9" data-pid="1996470065" data-project_backers_count="72" data-project_percent_raised="81.95" data-project_pid="1996470065" data-project_pledged="8195.0" data-project_state="live" data-section="home_nearly_funded">
<div class="project-thumbnail">

<a class="project-thumbnail-wrap" data-pid="1996470065" href="/projects/poetrysocietyny/the-7th-annual-new-york-city-poetry-festival?ref=home_nearly_funded" target="">
<img class="project-thumbnail-img" width="100%" alt="Project image" src="https://ksr-ugc.imgix.net/assets/016/194/878/8be208209ce488226db6f7f597a9a506_original.jpg?w=352&amp;h=198&amp;fit=fill&amp;bg=000000&amp;v=1491774010&amp;auto=format&amp;q=92&amp;s=e7c0611df1e28b9d1fe693d9ef0c0955" />
</a>
</div>
<div class="project-card-content">
<h6 class="project-title"><a target="" data-score="null" data-version="null" data-pid="1996470065" href="/projects/poetrysocietyny/the-7th-annual-new-york-city-poetry-festival?ref=home_nearly_funded">The 7th Annual New York City Poetry Festival</a></h6> <p class="project-byline">The Poetry Society of New York</p>
<p class="project-blurb">
250 poets. 75 organizations. 5 boroughs. 3 stages. 2 days. ONE CITY.
</p>
</div>
<div class="project-card-footer">
<div class="project-location">

<div class="grid-container">
<div class="center px3 py3">
<h2 class="normal">Where projects come from</h2>
<div class="grey-dark mb3 type-16">
Each and every Kickstarter project is the independent creation of someone like you. <div class="mobile-inline">Want to know more about how projects happen, or start your own?</div>

<div id="fb-root"></div>
<script>
  var channelUrl = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "/channel.html",
    needs_autologin = true && !$('body').is('.skip_autologin'),
    needs_refresh = true && false;
  
  window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
    FB.init({
      appId: window.fb_app_id,
      channelUrl: channelUrl,
      status: true,    // check login status
      cookie: true,    // enable cookies to allow the server to access the session
      xfbml: true,     // parse XFBML
      logging: false,  // turn off logging,
      version: 'v2.1'
    });
  
    FB.getLoginStatus(function (response) {
      if (response.status === 'connected') {
        if (read_cookie("logout_from_fb")) {
          FB.logout();
          destroy_cookie("logout_from_fb");
        } else if (needs_autologin) {
          $.get("/fb/autologin.js", {'fbsr': response.authResponse.signedRequest});
        } else if (needs_refresh && 0 == response.authResponse.userID) {
          $.get("/fb/refresh.js", {'fbsr': response.authResponse.signedRequest});
        }
      } else {
        if (read_cookie("logout_from_fb")) {
          destroy_cookie("logout_from_fb");
        }
      }
    })
  
    $(document).trigger('fb:loaded');
  };
  
  
  // Load the SDK Asynchronously
  (function(d){
    var js, id = 'facebook-jssdk'; if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
    js = d.createElement('script'); js.id = id; js.async = true;
    js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
    d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(js);
  }(document));
</script>
